item.description:
Word on the street is that St Anthony's Feast is one of the funnest summer events in Boston. Events on Sunday include the Grand Procession of St Anthony, classic Italian American music, the North End Iron Chef competition, an open air market place and some of Boston's best chefs showcasing their Italian cusine.

Here's the link for more information: http://www.stanthonys...

We'll meet in front of Martignetti's Liquor Store on the corner of Cross St and Hanover St. I'll still be there if it rains, and we can get coffee in the North End or find something else to do.

This will be a joint event with the Social Fun Meetup and the Boston Italian Language and Culture Meetup. If anyone doesn't have plans for Labor Day weekend come out and join us.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting in front of Martignetti Liquor (64 Cross St)

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: St Anthony's Feast in the North End
